channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2827] 25 Hilarious WiFi Network Names (PICS)
item.description: Giving your WiFi network a funny or clever name is a great way to freak out your annoying neighbors without hiding in their bushes or peeping in their windows late at night.

item.title: [+2085] Think Being Gay is a Sin? Think Again!
item.description: If a sin is a sin is a sin, then pretty much anything can be a sin, like driving under the speed limit, talking on the cell phone while placing an order in line, and watching Tyler Perry movies.

item.title: [+1962] Five Years of Digg...and counting
item.description: Five years ago today, Digg.com went live. What started as a simple idea has certainly come a long way. Two fun things to commemorate this day: Dec. 4, 2009 has been declared Digg.com day in San Francisco. And we're excited to launch Digg365, a way to see the top 10 stories on Digg on any given day, month or year. Happy 5th Birthday! - Kevin

item.title: [+1331] Paranoid Grandma Freaks Out about Facebook (Video)
item.description: his old lady thinks the government is spying on her Grandson and is going to put him in jail for having a Facebook account. If you use Facebook add Break to your friends list and it will help keep you out of jail.

item.title: [+1323] Analyst: "Bandwidth hogs" a myth, just like unicorns
item.description: One analyst has had it with Internet data caps. Bandwidth hogs are a myth, he says, and caps simply penalize heavy users who cause no problems for others. Now, he's throwing down the gauntlet and challenging ISPs to turn over some data for analysis.

item.title: [+1201] 'On My Camera After A Weekend Bender' (photobomb)
[+1100] Infinite Beard [PIC]
item.description: Infinite Beard: Facial hair taken to all new (and horrifying) extremes...

item.title: [+1068] Palin Goes 'Birther'
item.description: During an interview on Thursday with conservative talk radio host Rusty Humphries, former Governor Sarah Palin joined the birther movement -- those who doubt the authenticity of President Obama's birth certificate, thus calling into question the legitimacy of his presidency.

item.title: [+1058] Ex-thug repaid deli owner who helped him
item.description: A Long Island deli owner who held a robber at gunpoint, then let him go after giving him $40 and a loaf of bread, says he got an anonymous letter from the crook that included a $50 bill and a thank you.

item.title: [+925] Man Builds Amazing Model Cars Out of Aluminum Cans [PICS]
item.description: Meet Sandy Sanderson from New Zealand. Needing something to keep himself occupied after breaking his wrist in a motorcycle accident, he started building amazing model cars from discarded aluminum cans. His incredibly intricate work below.

item.title: [+893] What an awesome place to take a nap [PIC]
[+851] So What Do You Think About The Mario Cross Stitch I Made?
[+766] How Dangerous Is It to Read on the Toilet?
item.description: A doctor's reasons why it is dangerous to read on the toilet, and the ways of doing it safely.

item.title: [+656] Why A Comcast/NBC Merger Is Bad News
item.description: As the Comcast/NBC mergepocalypse draws near, we wanted to remind readers of the ways that this is going to harm consumers. Join us for a sad look into the future.

item.title: [+627] Wanted: Men Who Have Never Watched Porn
item.description: A research team from a Canadian university wanted to study the effects of porn on men's perceptions of women and sexuality. But they quickly ran into a problem. "We started our research seeking men in their twenties who had never consumed pornography," he said, "but we couldn't find any."

[+518] The Unemployment Game Show: Are You Really Unemployed?
item.description: The government is telling us that the economic stimulus is working and the recession is over. But you wouldn’t know it from looking at the unemployment numbers.

item.title: [+478] 6 Places You Should Not Attempt to Have Sex
item.description: The worst 6 places to have sex including hardwood floors, cars, kitchen and some other nasty places that'll get you hurt
